QuestData.Title: Advancing the Campaign
QuestData.Description: The time has come to lay the final blow against the fel orcs.$B$BAdvance Scout Chadwick awaits your presence inside the Shattered Halls of Hellfire Citadel. Make haste, their forces could strike against Honor Hold at any moment!
QuestData.LogDescription: Force Commander Danath Trollbane has asked you to speak with Advance Scout Chadwick inside the Shattered Halls of Hellfire Citadel.
